metadataAttributes.Title: Neuroscience and Neuroimaging Specialization
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: Familiarize yourself with fundamental concepts in neuroscience, like Functional Magnetic Resonance Imaging (fMRI), neurohacking (in R), and neuroimaging.
metadataAttributes.Skills: Experiment, Neuroscience, R Programming, Image Processing, Statistics, Statistical Analysis, Statistical Model, Preprocessor, Brain, Neurology,
metadataAttributes.Instructors: Arnold Bakker ,Martin Lindquist, PhD, MSc ,Tor Wager, PhD ,Dr. Elizabeth Sweeney  ,Ciprian M. Crainiceanu ,John Muschelli III  ,
